title: Search
---
You can search my blog with Google by entering a query into the text box below[^1].

---

[^1]: Sorry about the ads, but I can't afford $100/yr to remove them :) If it makes
      you feel any better, I don't make anything off them.

<!--Auto-Generated code from google...-->
<script>
  (function() {
    var cx = '002377860148431697356:mz5kbuy2lei';
    var gcse = document.createElement('script');
    gcse.type = 'text/javascript';
    gcse.async = true;
    gcse.src = 'https://cse.google.com/cse.js?cx=' + cx;
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(gcse, s);
  })();
</script>
<gcse:search></gcse:search>

<!--Some styling for the search box-->
<style>
.cse .gsc-control-cse,
.gsc-control-cse {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
}
</style>
